name: masochsim: the experience
description:
This is a game I made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1. The theme was "An end is a new beginning", and this is my spin on it!

BUT HOW DOES THIS FIT WITH THE THEME?!!

The enemies in the game would normally lead to a game over (an end) but they instead help you reach a new height (a new beginning). Thus, an end is a new beginning.

CONTROLS Arrows/Left StickMoveSpacebar/A ButtonJump CREDITS

Attila Kuti (me!) - Art, Sound Effects, Coding
Dominique J. Williams (iqdenim) - Music
